item.title: Howdy Week 2018
item.description: Howdy Week (previously known as Gig ‘Em week) kicks off this Sunday, August 19th. Since the only reason people go to Howdy Week is the free food, I went through the program and made a list of events that offer free food throughout the week. Event Name Date Time Location Pizza Party Aug 19 06:00 pm Academic Plaza Lights Out Aug 20 12:00 pm MSC 2401 Backyard Bash Aug 20 04:00 pm Rec Center Howdy Cookout Aug 20 06:00 pm Academic Plaza Howdy Hour Aug 21 12:12 pm MSC Aggiefest Aug 21 03:00 pm Simpson Drill Field Yell Practice Aug 21 05:30 pm Alumni Center VIP Shopping Aug 21 07:00 pm Barnes & Noble @ MSC Vision Lunch Aug 22 12:30 pm Aggie BSM Study Abroad 360 Aug 22 01:00 pm Rudder Exhibit Hall Libraries Open House Aug 22 01:00 pm Evans Library Baptist Church Dinner Aug 22 05:00 pm Aggie BSM Party on the Plaza Aug 22 08:00 pm Rudder Plaza StuAct Block Party Aug 23 11:30 am Koldus Rec-a-palooza Aug 23 06:30 pm Rec Center Welcome Back BBQ Aug 23 06:30 pm A&M United Methodist Church White Creek Open House Aug 24 11:00 am Student Services @ White Creek You can find the full schedule of events here: https://studentlife.
